posts.post_content:
Hello

Looking for Pinkerton PCs - back types are unimportant - I have exactly zero of these so if you have any available for sale or trade I would be interested! PM me with what you have

Thanks

Chris

I will sell this one for $245 net to me, delivered. PSA might even fix their mistaKe if you ask nicely (and they realize they screwed up). And apparently since they had no clue as to what it is they gave it an AUT.....which I don't think it rates.

[quote name="Leon" post=1840679]I will sell this one for $245 net to me, delivered. PSA might even fix their mistaKe if you ask nicely (and they realize they screwed up). And apparently since they had no clue as to what it is they gave it an AUT.....which I don't think it rates.[/QUOTE]

Hi Leon - I sent you a PM. 

Thanks!

Chris

I dug up a few more if interested. Bought raw and remain raw. Backs are mostly clean and blank.
Griffith has a small crease in the lower left corner and a bit of back damage to the blank back.$335
Myers has creases on each corner. $195
Cole has a horizontal crease across the whole card, near his elbow.   $145

[quote name="Bicem" post=1842027]He'll take them.[/QUOTE]

Jeff is paying for these by the way - same shipping address as before Leon 😎

[quote name="the-illini" post=1842164]Jeff is paying for these by the way - same shipping address as before Leon 😎[/QUOTE]

Jeff likes spending other collectors money. 
Got the address and my paypal hasn't changed either, thanks again!!

To anyone else, Chris only took Cole so the other 2 are still for sale....

This is my favorite Pinkerton and my top Card in my small collection

My collection can be seen here

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/144250058@N05/44848252232/in/photostream[/url]

Looking to buy or trade for Boston Red Sox Ruth, 1915 Boston Redsox team photo postcard with Babe Ruth or a PSA 2 or Higher 1909 Joe Jackson

That is great that you collect Pinkertons. However, it is not appropriate to post in someone else's thread with what you are looking for. Not the end of the world but shouldn't be done per the rules. You are always more than welcome to start your own thread with what you are looking for or about your favorite set. Just not in someone else's BST thread.  Thanks
